We stayed at the Doubletree for a couple nights and had a great experience with our room, as it was clean and comfortable. After checking out of the hotel, we were in a time crunch since we had a very early train ride back home. We unfortunately ran into some issues with getting an Uber/Lyft ride but Lawrence, who was working the front desk at the time, was quick and willing to help us problem-solve and was able to immediately call us a cab. If it weren‚Äôt for him, we would‚Äôve missed our train so we are especially thankful to him, as well as the Doubletree staff as a whole for an enjoyable stay! Would recommend!

Date of stay: August 2022
Amazing specially the bar crew.
Great place to stay and be close to many great Chicago sites. Also good for families. Everything we needed was there!
Will stay again and again perfect location and exceptional service. Rooms were clean and cookies were hot!
Moldy ceiling and walls in bathroom and air vents

Stay was very nice. They texted me when my room was ready for an early checkin. The rooms were clean and the staff friendly. My only complaints are the pillow quality is horrible. To get a drink or snacks you have to go all the way down to the lobby and the bar in the lobby doesn‚Äôt open until 4:00. Which was when we would leave the pool. Ended up going to the grocery store for our own drinks and snacks. Kind of a bummer.

review_title: A beautiful oasis in the city
review_content: Absolutely amazing from start to finish. My wife and I spent 2 nights with a pool view room. Newly renovated and very comfortable. The staff at this hotel couldn't have been more helpful. Considering that the service industry is lacking employees, you would not know that staying here. The outdoor pool was fantastic and is a rare find in the city. We used to stay at the Blu Aqua, but this hotel is so much better in our opinion. Finally the location is perfect for walking and is filled with so many excellent restaurants. We will be coming back for Labor Day we loved it so much.

I love staying in the King Studio room. This time the bed was a little uncomfortable. There is always a slight wait time when checking in or out. Overall the location is great & the hotel is an awesome place to stay.

Check in was horrendous not only did they say a manager had canceled my room they blamed it on me. The lady that checked me in was very rude and blamed the mistake on .e until corrected by another teammember of hers.
Very clean and inside pool was nice

To start the bathtub kept getting on clogging up every time the shower was turned on. So taking a shower wasn't possible and especially staying there for 3 days which was a disappointment we told a worker and her never showed up. We needed towels in our room and never got them so we ended up going again and asking around 1 pm and they told us there isn‚Äôt any available. Finally around 12:30 am we got a knock on our door and they gave us 4 small hand towels. Very disappointed with this trip and especially this being our first time there. Also when we went to the pool there weren‚Äôt any towels available. The lady said they were all used.
It was all good
It was ok, pool could‚Äôve been cleaner and was smaller in person. No hand soap in the room and a small shampoo for 4 ppl.

On word: cockroaches. Stay literally anywhere else. I stayed for two nights over the 4th of July weekend, and while the first night was okay, I came back to my room the second night and saw a cockroach crawling up my headboard. I immediately packed my stuff and checked out of the room. The overnight front desk person was nice and offered another room, but I knew I wouldn‚Äôt sleep. I ended up sleeping on a friend‚Äôs couch, and thank goodness I had local friends!!! That was the most major issue, but there were minor issues as well. First, there were no tongs with the ice pail, and despite calling and asking for some and being told some tongs were on the way, we never did get tongs. Okay, no big deal, I thought. I booked this place for the rooftop pool, and the pool itself is a lot of fun. Unfortunately, there are no rules about music, so multiple people were blasting competing, terrible music, and it definitely affected the vibe. We went out to the pool at around 1PM, and there were no towels. We asked for towels, and the staff person told us that the person who washes towels wouldn‚Äôt be in until 3PM. They did come back to the pool with about eight towels, but we only managed to get one to share for four people. When I called to get a refund for the second night, the person I spoke to was argumentative, impatient, and unhelpful. I had to call three times because she hung up after answering one question each time. I have to wait 3-5 business days to see if the refund, so we‚Äôll see
